title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions:
Introducing our 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle Set! This set of 16 scented candles is the perfect gift for your loved ones, whether it's your Mother, Wife, Daughter, or Friend. 

Each candle is carefully crafted with natural soy wax, ensuring a clean and eco-friendly burn. Infused with essential oils, these candles release delightful fragrances that will create a soothing and relaxing atmosphere. With scents like Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Bergamot, and more, there's something for everyone to enjoy.

The compact size of these tin candles makes them incredibly portable. Take them with you wherever you go and enjoy their enchanting aromas anytime, anywhere. The burn time for each candle is an impressive 18-20 hours, allowing for long-lasting enjoyment.

Not only are these candles a treat for the senses, but they are also housed in recyclable tin cans. After enjoying the candles, repurpose the containers as flowerpots or home decorations, adding a touch of charm to your space.

Safety is our top priority, so please remember to keep the candles out of reach of children and pets when unattended to avoid accidents and fire. 

Don't miss out on this perfect gift for any occasion. Treat your loved ones, or even yourself, to the luxurious and captivating experience of our 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle Set today!

With 16 delightful scents to choose from, including Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Bergamot, Fig, Lavender, Lemon, Spring, Gardenia, Strawberry, Rosemary, Peppermint, Bluebell, Wood Sage & Sea Salt, Peony Cherry Blossom, and English Pear & Freesia, there's a scent for every mood and occasion.

Not only do these candles smell amazing, but they also have an impressive burn time of 18-20 hours per candle. The tin can container adds a touch of elegance to any room and can be easily recycled after use.
